column2: [85] For those reasons, in view of the answer to the question of law No. 1 in
favour of the Appellant, I annul the determination made by the Tax Appeals
Commission  dated  07.02.2013  and  the  Registrar  is  directed  to  send  a

column1: certified copy of this judgment to the Tax Appeals Commission.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
